inclusion.criterion: Upper GI endoscopy for other indications
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: BMI ≤ 35 or Body Mass Index (BMI) is ≤30 to 34.9 kg/m2 with at least one treated or untreated comorbid condition
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: comorbid condition (hypertension, dyslipidaemia, cardiovascular disease, glucose intolerance, sleep apnoea, NASH)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ambulatory and able to perform the ILBS healthy lifestyle (diet and exercise program)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Change in weight of ≤5 % within 3 months
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Recent major surgery; history of seizure disorder
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 60-year-old woman admitted to the stroke department with a recent history of aspiration pneumonia. She has been febrile and complained of abdominal pain and diarrhea.
